subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin, who will start from the pole at Bristol Motor Speedway, and Joey Logano, who qualified fourth, say they have moved past the confrontation that broke out a year ago at the same track.
snippet: Denny Hamlin, who will start from the pole at Bristol Motor Speedway, and Joey Logano, who qualified fourth, say they have moved past the confrontation that broke out a year ago at the same track.
